p: In compound 4, the –NH stretching vibration was observed at 3298 cm -1. The –C=N vibration signal appeared at 1544 cm -1, the –C=S signal of thiosemicarbazone region was observed at 1409 cm -1, and the -C–N stretching vibration appeared at 1195 cm -1, as shown in Figure 1. The IR peaks of the compounds are presented in Table 3 (see Supplementary information). The frequency data of all of the molecules were consistent with those reported for similar compounds [8,10,28,29].
